channel.title: [Hyperion]Ixtlis - The Key to Success
channel.description:
[center][URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/715/cooltext897042152.png/][IMG]http://img715.imageshack.us/img715/6846/cooltext897042152.png[/img][/URL] [URL=https://github.com/Arham4/Ixtlis][IMG]http://img11.imageshack.us/img11/6963/cooltext898048991.png[/img][/URL][/center] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/651/cooltext897043262.png/][IMG]http://img651.imageshack.us/img651/2834/cooltext897043262.png[/img][/URL] Ixtlis is a side project from me. The aim of the project is to try and make hyperion a noob-friendly source. I absolutely hate when wL is called simple, when Hyperion is also simple in a way for programmers like me. So, this is an 'allusion'. It alludes the fact that Hyperion [b]is[/b] simple to use. Hyperion wasn't a big jump for me when I quit PI. So no, I do not support PI or any wL for a fact.
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/507/cooltext897046320.png/][IMG]http://img507.imageshack.us/img507/6773/cooltext897046320.png[/img][/URL]
[code=Update Log] 1/26/13 - Downloaded Hyperion. 1/26/13 - Made topic. 1/26/13 - Redid packaging. 1/27/13 - Fixed some packaging errors. 1/27/13 - Made eating an action. [/code]
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/705/cooltext897188837.png/][IMG]http://img705.imageshack.us/img705/4365/cooltext897188837.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/843/packagingo.png/][IMG]http://img843.imageshack.us/img843/5388/packagingo.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/29/cooltext897047853.png/][IMG]http://img29.imageshack.us/img29/8761/cooltext897047853.png[/img][/URL]
[ul][li]Graham[/li] [li]Canownueasy[/li] [li]Int Bauk[/li][/ul]
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/407/cooltext897048515.png/][IMG]http://img407.imageshack.us/img407/9354/cooltext897048515.png[/img][/URL] [code=Put this in your signature] Support [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,598344.0.html]Ixtlis[/url]! [/code]

item.title: [Hyperion]Ixtlis - The Key to Success
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“Fire capez, post:27, topic:480108”][quote author=AtomicInt_ link=topic=598344.msg4210052#msg4210052 date=1359411579]

What was wrong with the original packaging?

You have to ask?

I mean the original hyperion packaging… there’s no need to be so pedantic about something of this size.

This definitively is not standard Hyperion packaging.

What was wrong with the original packaging?

It doesn’t make sense.
[/quote]

Ok how much clearer do I have to make it. In my original post I asked a simple question, what was wrong with the original packaging? What I meant by this was why did they bother changing the packaging. As for my second post, i’m stating that changing the packaging is something so trivial and it’s pedantic to change it ‘for the sake of it’, maybe my posts were misleading but i’m clearing it up now.[/quote]
He’s saying my packaging doesn’t make sense. Which is true.

Read full topic

item.title: [Hyperion]Ixtlis - The Key to Success
item.dc:creator: @Fire_capez Fire capez
item.description:
@Fire_capez wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:25, topic:480108”][quote author=Fire capez link=topic=598344.msg4210029#msg4210029 date=1359408794]

What was wrong with the original packaging?

You have to ask?

I mean the original hyperion packaging… there’s no need to be so pedantic about something of this size.
[/quote]

This definitively is not standard Hyperion packaging.

What was wrong with the original packaging?

It doesn’t make sense.[/quote]

Ok how much clearer do I have to make it. In my original post I asked a simple question, what was wrong with the original packaging? What I meant by this was why did they bother changing the packaging. As for my second post, i’m stating that changing the packaging is something so trivial and it’s pedantic to change it ‘for the sake of it’, maybe my posts were misleading but i’m clearing it up now.

Read full topic

item.title: [Hyperion]Ixtlis - The Key to Success
item.dc:creator: @Christmas_tree Christmas_tree
item.description:
@Christmas_tree wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:22, topic:480108”]lol I don’t really see the point of this, don’t you understand? People are NOT going to stop using winterlove. Why? because no one needs a server that can hold 2000 players… most people hosting a server just need a base with lots of content, and that can hold a decent amount of players… They don’t care about design or any of that shit. Only reason I continued Ademia is because some people on r-s wanted me too. But I realize now that the project was a waste of time.

Whatever, good luck, hope you learn something[/quote]

That feeling when somebody out there understands you glows

item.title: [Hyperion]Ixtlis - The Key to Success
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

lol I don’t really see the point of this, don’t you understand? People are NOT going to stop using winterlove. Why? because no one needs a server that can hold 2000 players… most people hosting a server just need a base with lots of content, and that can hold a decent amount of players… They don’t care about design or any of that shit. Only reason I continued Ademia is because some people on r-s wanted me too. But I realize now that the project was a waste of time.

Whatever, good luck, hope you learn something

Read full topic

item.title: [Hyperion]Ixtlis - The Key to Success
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“Scully, post:18, topic:480108”]So your naming isn’t that great either, NormalAction, I think you mean DefaultAction. The quest step handling system is just plain awful. There’s absolutely no reason to handle it through other classes. Do it within the Cook’s Assistant class, for example.

Do not handle actions within the packet packaging; that’s simply for handling packets. There’s no need to go into an impl section, or to rewrite the same class over and over again for picking. If you’re going to do them all the same way, make one class with an array and read from the index for what it replaces, or do an enum and handle different things so you can change the string.

As you read on Rune-Server, I still don’t agree with your packaging, either. Regarding your response to that, I stick to what I said.[/quote]
im fixing man. And I told you, im making a new quest system.

Read full topic

item.title: [Hyperion]Ixtlis - The Key to Success
item.dc:creator: @Scully Scully
item.description:
@Scully wrote:

So your naming isn’t that great either, NormalAction, I think you mean DefaultAction. The quest step handling system is just plain awful. There’s absolutely no reason to handle it through other classes. Do it within the Cook’s Assistant class, for example.

Do not handle actions within the packet packaging; that’s simply for handling packets. There’s no need to go into an impl section, or to rewrite the same class over and over again for picking. If you’re going to do them all the same way, make one class with an array and read from the index for what it replaces, or do an enum and handle different things so you can change the string.

As you read on Rune-Server, I still don’t agree with your packaging, either. Regarding your response to that, I stick to what I said.

Read full topic
